TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CategoryAttribute extends System.Attribute

summary.span: 指定当属性或事件显示在一个设置为“按分类顺序”模式的 控件中时，用于对属性或事件分组的类别的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the category in which to group the property or event when displayed in a control set to Categorized mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A表示要将关联的属性或事件，关联的类别列出的属性或事件中的时控件设置为模式。A indicates the category to associate the associated property or event with, when listing properties or events in a control set to mode. 如果尚未应用于属性或事件，将其与关联**杂项**类别。If a has not been applied to a property or event, the associates it with the **Misc** category. 可以通过指定类别的名称的构造函数中的任何名称创建新类别。A new category can be created for any name by specifying the name of the category in the constructor for the . 属性指示该属性表示的类别的名称。The property indicates the name of the category that the attribute represents. 属性还提供透明本地化的类别名称。The property also provides transparent localization of category names. ## Examples 下面的示例创建`MyImage`属性。The following example creates the `MyImage` property. 该属性具有两个属性：和。The property has two attributes: a and a . [!code-cpp[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 下一个示例获取的类别`MyImage`。The next example gets the category for `MyImage`. 首先，代码获取的对象的所有属性。First, the code gets a with all the properties for the object. 接下来，代码索引获取`MyImage`。Next, the code indexes into the to get `MyImage`. 然后它返回此属性的属性并将其保存在变量`attributes`。Then it returns the attributes for this property and saves them in the variable `attributes`. 示例然后通过检索输出类别从，并将它写入到控制台屏幕。The example then prints the category by retrieving from the , and writing it to the console screen. [!code-cpp[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic CategoryAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic CategoryAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#2)]

para.span: 如果你使用不同于预定义的名称，类别名称，并且想要进行本地化类别名称，必须重写方法。

span.span: If you use category names other than the predefined names, and you want to localize your category names, you must override the method.
The class defines the following common categories:

item.description: 与相关的可用操作的属性。
Properties related to available actions.
与相关的实体的显示方式的属性。
Properties related to how an entity appears.
与相关的实体的处理方式的属性。
Properties related to how an entity acts.
对数据和数据源管理相关的属性。
Properties related to data and data source management.
在默认类别中的分组的属性。
Properties that are grouped in a default category.
仅在设计时是可用的属性。
Properties that are available only at design time.
与拖放操作相关的属性。
Properties related to drag-and-drop operations.
与焦点相关的属性。
Properties related to focus.
为格式化相关的属性。
Properties related to formatting.
键盘相关的属性。
Properties related to the keyboard.
为布局相关的属性。
Properties related to layout.
与鼠标相关的属性。
Properties related to the mouse.
与顶级窗体的窗口样式相关的属性。
Properties related to the window style of top-level forms.

span.span: For more information, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string category) cil managed

span.span: The name of the category.

summary.span: 使用指定的类别名称初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified category name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你为提供的名称`category`参数是一个预定义的类别名称，名称将自动按本地化属性。If the name you provide for the `category` parameter is one of the predefined category names, the name will be automatically localized by the property. 如果你提供的名称不是预定义的类别名称，并且不是重写不会本地化方法以提供具有本地化的名称，类别名称。If the name you provide is not a predefined category name, and you do not override the method to provide a localized name, the category name will not be localized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性调用来获取第一次访问它的类别的本地化的名称。This property calls to get the localized name of the category the first time it is accessed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetLocalizedString(string value) cil managed
Protected Overridable Function GetLocalizedString (value As String) As String

param.name: value
param.span: 要查阅的类别的标识符。

span.span: The identifer for the category to look up.

summary.span: 查阅指定类别的本地化名称。

span.span: Looks up the localized name of the specified category.

returns.span: 类别的本地化名称；如果本地化名称不存在，则为 。

span.span: The localized name of the category, or if a localized name does not exist.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性调用此方法访问要查找指定的类别的本地化名称的第一个时间。The property calls this method the first time it is accessed to look up the localized name for the specified category.

para.span: 重写此方法以将你自己的本地化的名称添加到类别。

span.span: Override this method to add your own localized names to categories.

para.span: 如果可用于给定值的本地化的字符串，该方法应返回它。

span.span: If a localized string is available for the given value, the method should return it.

para.span: 否则，调用基类的方法，以便将该字符串本地化的基类。

span.span: Otherwise, call the base class's method to let the base class localize the string.
